Articles.Content:
small series I made, wanted to build my definition of a space train. Then just see how much I could get done with it. Overall I'd call it a smashing success!

LOTS OF DOCKING

Hope you enjoy!

part 1 (montage) http://youtu.be/SCQNW5zWGoU

part 2 (cometary) http://youtu.be/gt0xZMOHqW8

part 3 (cometary) http://youtu.be/qZSynJ2ROls

Totals roughly 30 minutes
cool, but I think you could do without the videos and show us some good ol' pics.
